title: Legendz: Yomigaeru Ryuuou Densetsu
title_en: Legendz: Tale of the Dragon Kings
title_jp: レジェンズ 甦る竜王伝説
synopsis: When a crafty toy company "Wiz" also known in this show as Dark Wiz Company, finds crystals with the faint DNA of monsters known as "Legendz" are found and made into a battle game.
